_header: Of a maid Christ did not forsake
Subjects: carols, of the Trinity; Trinity, carols to
_description: James Ryman, a song of praise to God — seven quatrains (aaab) with ‘Te deum laudamus’ refrain and burden: ‘Dulciter pangamus / Te deum laudamus’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Of a mayde criste did not forsakeMankyende to take man fre to
                    make…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Thy myelde seruantis in euery coostTe deum
                    laudamus
